articles.title: AirAsia X proposes paying 0.5% of US$8.1b debt owed to creditors - The Star Online
articles.description: KUALA LUMPUR: AirAsia X Bhd (AAX) is proposing to pay just 0.5% of debt owed to each of its creditors and to terminate all existing contracts so that it can restructure 33.65 billion ringgit ($8.1 billion) of liabilities, a document seen by Reuters shows.
